import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import CheckCircleIcon from "@mui/icons-material/CheckCircle" import EditIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Edit" import DeleteIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Delete" const Todoitem = ({item}) => { let { task, completed } = item const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState([task]) const logNewTask = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setNewTask(() => e.target.value) } return (

{task}

{completed}

) } export default Todoitem
